item.title: Espanso
item.description:
Ever being tired of rewriting the same email again and again? This is very common in office environments. While in coding we rely on snippets like YASnippet in emacs or UltiSnips/LuaSnip for vim/neovim, I haven't seen an alternative for system global snippets.

In this contex, a snippet is a short keyword that expands to a complete text or function. For example, typing ex in org-mode in emacs using YASnippet, will expand to an example block:
